name: Space Jockey
description:
Inspired by the Space Jockey from the ALIEN franchise.

1st of a series inspired by ALIEN

2D animated painting created over a sketch.

I guess it could also be called "Clouds Jockey" in this case. Also, the chariot-like transport, the cloud sword and cape doesn't hide the medieval inspiration.

The Space jockey character was originally designed by HR Giger for Ridley Scott's ALIEN (1979), with a later update for Prometheus (2012)

Original drawing, illustration and animation by zamahel
https://linktr.ee/zamahel
